html: The IRS will NEVER initiate contact by email or text message to request personal or financial information.
text: The IRS will NEVER initiate contact by email or text message to request personal or financial information.

html: The IRS will NEVER threaten to bring in local police or other law-enforcement groups to have you arrested for not paying.
text: The IRS will NEVER threaten to bring in local police or other law-enforcement groups to have you arrested for not paying.

html: The IRS will NEVER ask for credit or debit card numbers over the phone.
text: The IRS will NEVER ask for credit or debit card numbers over the phone.

html: The IRS will NEVER require you to use a specific payment method for your taxes, such as a prepaid debit card or cash.
text: The IRS will NEVER require you to use a specific payment method for your taxes, such as a prepaid debit card or cash.

html: The IRS will NEVER demand that you pay taxes without giving you the opportunity to question or appeal the amount they say you owe.
text: The IRS will NEVER demand that you pay taxes without giving you the opportunity to question or appeal the amount they say you owe.

html: Remember: The IRS will NEVER call to demand immediate payment, or call about taxes owed without first having mailed you a bill.pic.twitter.com/jzoUHgHeXD

html: The bill also encourages states to limit the detention of youth status offenders who've committed an offense that would not be criminal if committed by an adult, like truancy, breaking curfew or running away from home. There's no reason for these kids to be incarcerated.

html: Youth Promise Grants will help local communities disrupt the school-to-prison pipeline and support at-risk youth through a variety of programs, like tutoring, youth mentoring and physical and mental health programs.

html: In addition, last week, Congress passed the Juvenile Justice Reform Act to reauthorize our federal JJ programs. This bill included two policies I've led in the Senate: Youth Promise Grants and limiting the detention of youth status offenders.

html: There are no excuses. Every child that was cruelly separated from their parents, from months-old babies to young teenagers, must be reunited with their families.
text: There are no excuses. Every child that was cruelly separated from their parents, from months-old babies to young teenagers, must be reunited with their families.

html: The Administration has an obligation to ensure that children whose health has been adversely impacted by this policy receive appropriate medical services. Congress must demand that the Administration take steps to reunite every child that has been separated from their parents.
text: The Administration has an obligation to ensure that children whose health has been adversely impacted by this policy receive appropriate medical services. Congress must demand that the Administration take steps to reunite every child that has been separated from their parents.

html: This hellish policy was a choice and there must be a full measure of accountability for those officials who ordered it, defended it and carried it out.
text: This hellish policy was a choice and there must be a full measure of accountability for those officials who ordered it, defended it and carried it out.

html: The Admin, aided by the complicity of extreme congressional Republicans, made a proactive decision to enact a policy that harmed children, told falsehoods about the origin & scope of the policy & for days held the fate of these kids hostage in order to extract policy concessions.
text: The Admin, aided by the complicity of extreme congressional Republicans, made a proactive decision to enact a policy that harmed children, told falsehoods about the origin & scope of the policy & for days held the fate of these kids hostage in order to extract policy concessions.

html: These medical experts have said that the long-term impacts of this barbaric treatment could be lifelong health problems, such as heart disease and substance abuse disorders.
text: These medical experts have said that the long-term impacts of this barbaric treatment could be lifelong health problems, such as heart disease and substance abuse disorders.

html: Nearly 2,000 children have been subjected to what the American Academy of Pediatrics has called, ‘toxic stress’ and ‘amounts to child abuse.’
text: Nearly 2,000 children have been subjected to what the American Academy of Pediatrics has called, ‘toxic stress’ and ‘amounts to child abuse.’

html: Family detention is far from the only or best solution for the majority of families at the border. In addition, for thousands of children, the damage is already done.
text: Family detention is far from the only or best solution for the majority of families at the border. In addition, for thousands of children, the damage is already done.

html: It is long overdue for President Trump to amend the most egregious element of his cruel and inhumane policy of ripping migrant children from their parents. But substituting a lesser form of cruelty for a greater form is still cruelty.
